then what we're gonna do is we're gonna

there's gonna be a 95 to 99 percent

right I don't think I've ever cut a leek

gonna clean these twice first will give

definitely don't be afraid to separate

good you can always put it back together
it's not gonna matter these are gonna

so we're gonna generously season this
with some
ashlee ground black pepper some cayenne
